name: Asian Sugar Snap Pea Appetizer
author: Heidi T
summary: Bursting with flavor, these Asian-inspired snap peas can be served hot as a side dish or chilled as a quick appetizer!
ingredients: ¼ cup low sodium soy sauce
directions: Preheat the oven broiler, and move oven rack into the top position
Place the snap peas onto a baking pan, drizzle with olive oil and toss to coat
Spread the snap peas out into a single layer
Broil the snap peas in the preheated oven until tender, about 5 minutes
Meanwhile, mix together the soy sauce, sesame oil, chili oil, brown sugar, and sesame seeds in a large bowl
When the snap peas come out of the oven, toss them immediately with the sauce
